id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

flow.docs:
The estimated volume flow of the medium in `m³/h`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

head.docs:
The estimated head (preasure difference generated by the pump) in `m`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
The power consumption of the pump in `W`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
Current in `A`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor)

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

speed.docs:
the speed of the pump rotor in `RPM`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
Voltage in `V`. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Grundfos Alpha3](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/alpha3.html#configuration-variables)*
